constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 111 (Friday, June 25, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SIRES:
H.R. 4188.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Pursuant to clause 3(d)(1) of rule XIII of the Rules of the
House of Representatives, the Committee finds the authority
for this legislation in article I, section 8 of the
Constitution.
[Page H3156]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

title: Respect for Peace Corps Volunteers Act
